message: I propose we split the money 50/50. This ensures fairness and avoids any potential conflict.
I'll take the majority, you can have a small consolation prize. It's only fair after your initial 50/50 proposal was so low.
I suggest we equally share the amount, considering the diminishing value of money in each subsequent round.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I still think I deserve more considering my initial proposal was rejected.
